title: Raindrops on Roses
description: Alternate cover for this ISBN can be found hereFrom the #1 Bestselling Author of THE GREAT PRETENDER comes a highly-anticipated new trilogy!Love, Loss, Jealousy & Vengeance — A Razor-Sharp Love Triangle For the History Books!***Book One of the sizzling new FAVORITE THINGS Trilogy***What happens when the man you love, falls in love with someone else?Mayfair Island, Florida. Grief-stricken after the sudden loss of her beloved grandmother, an enduring but reclusive Hollywood icon, young Priscilla Bauer finds herself adrift and looking to find solace in the arms of her vast inheritance, when she meets the kind and considerate corporate brand designer, Michael Frost—a drop dead gorgeous beacon of light in her all too dark night. Falling hard and falling fast, Priscilla has no idea she’s stepped into dangerous territory...Because someone else has already branded Michael Frost her very own—and she has no intention of ever letting him go. Passions are high, but bitter vengeance gets even higher! With RAINDROPS ON ROSES, the captivating Favorite Things Novella Trilogy—takes flight!
author: Millenia Black
